DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the possibility that erythropoietin with early iron supplementation may induce retinopathy of prematurity or worsen this disease. In addition risk factors for the development of ROP will be checked.
DOC.brief_title: Erythropoietin and Early Iron Supplement and Retinopathy of Prematurity
DOC.criteria: all premature infants with birth weight of 1250 grams or less
